bug.author: lvv
bug.summary: Docs: Incomplete description of applyColorMap() parameters
bug.description:
applyColorMap function have two features:
input image must have depth of CV_8U only If input image have different depth, applyColorMap silently returns (in second parameter) unmodified input image.
I personally consider both of above as bugs, but this is only my own sense of style. Submitted issue is about the fact that non of the above features are reflected in docs. These features are described in colormap.cpp:148, but not in RST docs.
